feed.title: LudoLoon Studio - blog
feed.subtitle:
Here's that music you wanted!
Subscribe on Patreon for stems and early tracks.

entry.title: Rice Lake Frolf Course Remaster
entry.summary: Play on my hometown frolf course circa 2013! (Work In Progress)
entry.content:
I've recreated the WITC Disc Golf Course, available to play on either regular screens or in VR. Includes self-hosted multiplayer.

This is a proof of concept prototype that I was inspired to make after learning how to use BlenderGIS to download map data. It's still got bugs, but you can play the course like you're walking around it in real life.

I'm gonna be real busy for the foreseeable future so it's probably gonna stay like this for a while, unless any bugs are relatively easy fixes. That said when I can get back to it, I'd love to add more if there's interest.

Overall I learned a lot about Godot, 3D modeling and gamedev from this project.

entry.title: LudoLoon Yacht Dice
entry.summary: In a surprising turn of events, I'm getting back into gamedev. I made a yacht dice clone!
entry.content:
In a surprise turn of events, I got back into game development! I recently watched the Brackey's Godot tutorial and figured I'd port a previous version of Yacht Dice I made in React that was just sitting there.

The goal was to learn more about the editor with the intention to make more games. So keep an eye out for more!

You can find the game on itch.io in the summary below. Enjoy!

Summary

From the project's itch page: https://ludoloonstudio.itch.io/yacht-dice

    My first godot game!

    Decided to make a clone of the classic dice game, yacht dice.
    Not technically yahtzee since there's no 3 of a kind option. 
    Pretty simple though, you basically try to get the highest score you can.

    You can play by yourself, with others locally or against the AI. 
    Up to 16 players is possible! 
    You can even have the AI play against itself if you remove the human player after adding AI opponents. 
    Someday I may add online if I need a good practice run lol.

    Feel free to screenshot your high scores and leave them in the comments.

    Works with mouse or keys. Also works with gamepads:
    - A to select
    - B to cancel
    - D-pad to navigate
    - Y (top button) to swap between selecting scorecard & dice (d-pad also works)
    - X (left button) or Space to roll

    If your browser allows it, your scores & settings should save. For sure they will on the windows & linux version.

    Music by yours truly! Available here or on my website.

    Special thanks to andresix, toddcircle and corkob for a few of the SFX (available on freesound.org)</p>

entry.title: VGMcon 2024!
entry.summary: Hi there! I was at VGMcon in Minneapolis. Wanna get connected?
entry.content:
EDIT: This was an awesome time! Best year yet.

Hi there! I was at VGMcon in Minneapolis. If we met, feel free to DM me or check out my social media pages below under Subscribe. You can find me on discord through the VGMcon server too.

Super excited to check out everyone's sets and have a dope ass time with y'all.

I'm based here in Minneapolis so if you want to collab or hang, hmu! To learn more about me, check out my about page.

tl;dr: I started this LudoLoon Studio project as a gamedev thing, then focused on video game music instead. I've made asset packs for use in games and put out a lot of VGM styled music (some in game jams), flight sim music videos and other things. I play mainly keys through Renoise, but I like to jam on Mandolin and pretty much anything else (not necessarily well lol).

Nice to meet you! Feel free to reach out again, community is the main reason I do this stuff.

P.S: Excuse the jank, haven't had time to upload PS2 graveyards to youtube to properly embed it on the site yet lol. Got some work to do on the site in general anyway.

entry.title: PS2 Graveyards
entry.summary: An album I created as an ode to the bygone era of spooky, nostalgic Playstation 2 graveyards.
entry.content:
Summary

PS2 Graveyards is an ode to the sounds that inspired me playing games like King's Field and Silent Hill 2 growing up, and the dying past they represent. Definitely a bit of a danceable take, but there's still some good old fashioned ambience too.

So go find a graveyard you love and put this shit on lol.

entry.title: Introducing: Ludo Air
entry.summary: Introducing my virtual travel blog & flight web design portfolio project. Check it out!
entry.content:
Hey folks!

You all know I love flight sim. Lately I've been getting into web design. So I decided, well why not make a super cool portfolio project where I run a virtual travel blog, offer virtual flights and have an excuse to make a lot of cool stuff.

I'll be working on overhauling my online infrastructure in general, but yeah if you like flight sim & want to see cool photos then there's more to come.

I'll share any music videos on here that come out of it as well.

Find it here: air.ludoloon.studio

entry.title: Game jam project: Bastard Tower
entry.summary: Bastard Tower is a game jam project that I helped make music for.
entry.content:
I helped make the music for the game jam project Bastard Tower!

It was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 by The Great DS.

Features some upbeat boss music vibes as well as ambient builder music that I'm very pleased with :)

Summary

From the project's itch page:

The world has been absolutely dominated by stupid demonic creatures, now the last humans must fight them and survive their army of evil!

Order your team and build a high tower to protect your humans from the demons.

You are going to DIE in the end.. But hopefuly the next group of survivors may finish the tower.

entry.title: Mind Games
entry.summary: I put together a music pack that's perfect for any chill puzzle or platformer game.
entry.content:
Summary:

Mind Games is chill, groovy, blues & jazz styled music for puzzle games & platformers.

Description:

Includes ready-to-go full loops, in addition to stems & sequences. You can craft the emotion exactly how you need it based on your narrative or game mechanic needs.

Tracklist:

  • Puzzled Mind (1:39)
  • Brainstorm (1:04)
  • Faulty Memory (1:43)
  • Funky Feeling (1:52)
  • Meditation (1:28)
  • Sneaky Thoughts (1:06)
  • Hazy Mood (1:06)
  • Clear Headed (1:04)
  • Dream (1:25)
  • Wandering Rumination (1:22)

Total Runtime: 13:51 (not including sequences, stems, etc)

Full Pack Details

Essentials & Full Pack are both included when you purchase this pack. Essentials includes only the full loops (no stems or sequences).

Format:

  • .wav / 44.1khz / 16-bit depth / Loopable / Stereo

Number of Files:

  • Full Pack: 148
  • Essentials: 10

Total project size:

  • Full Pack: 1.2GB
  • Essentials: 152.2MB

See below for full file list.

Licensing Agreement

The actual license varies by which asset store you download from (see their terms for more).

However, whether paid or free, the general rights & restrictions to use my music are this:

Your Rights

  • You may use this music in any of your projects, whether they're commercial or not.
  • You may edit or remix them to better suit your project's needs.
  • You may use my music in multiple projects without further payment (if required).
  • While you don't have to give credit to LudoLoon Studio, it's still certainly appreciated!

Restrictions

  • Copyright ownership of all recordings still belongs to LudoLoon Studio LLC.
  • You may NOT resell, relicense or otherwise distribute any packs or individual tracks by themselves.
  • For any soundtrack deals please contact support@ludoloon.studio to negotiate a deal.
    • Otherwise, you may NOT redistribute my music as part of a standalone game soundtrack.

If you want to buy an individual track that's part of a music pack we can also arrange that by email.

P.S. If you use my music, send your promo to connect@ludoloon.studio and I'll share it!

Contact

Support & inquiries: support@ludoloon.studio

Available for hire: https://ludoloon.studio/hire

Subscribe to my ko-fi for discounts on other packs.

File List

This pack is divided into different possible downloads (all included with a single purchase):

  • Full Pack
  • Essentials

Essentials Pack only comes with the full loop. Full Pack includes folders for stems & sequences.

Unity only includes the Full Pack edition because of how their distribution works.

entry.title: Game jam project: Giggly's Dare
entry.summary: Giggly's Dare is a game jam project that I helped make music for.
entry.content:
I helped make the music for the game jam project Giggly's Dare!

It was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam by The Great DS.

Features some Venetian Snares styled breakcore that I'm very pleased with :)

Summary

From the project's itch page:

Play a set of crazy Playgrounds and survive against the psycho Giggly who's stole your soul in this retro horror platformer.

Finished in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

entry.title: New Searchable Music Database!
entry.summary: I was recently hard at work this week making a nifty search table for my music.
entry.content:
Hello again everyone!

I recently updated the website so now I have a super slick database system that you can search to really find exactly what you're looking for. I decided now would be a good time to deal with this before I put out much more music.

Please let me know if you find any issues, but I think I've done a decent job of stress testing this new design. It all runs pretty slick on my hardware, but if you notice that it's too slow then send me an email to support@ludoloon.studio so I can address it.

For the nerds out there: It's just a JSON structured database that I bring in with a script tag. That feeds the data into my basic little keyword search engine table.

The previous music page will now be my "Works" page, which will be a portfolio of any completed albums or other projects (like games & videos), that my music is in.

Anyway, super excited about this new development, should be much easier to sort through my music :) (and post it lol)

entry.title: Roguelike Adventure Music Pack
entry.summary: I put together a music pack that's perfect for any roguelike, adventure or other type of game.
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I am excited to announce my Roguelike Adventure Music Pack!

Summary:

Music for all types of classic RPG & Action Adventure locations! Ready to go, easy to customize.

Description:

Roguelike Adventure Music Pack is the essential music pack for any game that needs high quality, memorable tunes that are ready to go for your game, right now.

Each track has a variety of full length, seamlessly loopable versions and sections. You can craft the emotion exactly how you need it based on your narrative or game mechanic needs. If you prefer to do it the old fashioned way and just set it on loop, as is, you can also do that too.

Included are a variety of classic video game themed locations such as:

  • Castle
  • Cave
  • Desert
  • Dungeon
  • Forest
  • Hills & Valleys
  • Ruins
  • Sewers
  • Town
  • Winter

This pack also includes other essential game sounds like:

  • Title music
  • Menu music
  • Victory music
  • Game Over music
  • Loot SFX
  • Treasure SFX

Full Pack Details

Essentials & Full Pack are both included when you purchase this pack. Essentials includes only the full loops instead of individually rendered sections.

Format:

  • .wav / 44.1khz / 16-bit depth / Loopable / Stereo
  • .mp3 / 44.1khz / V0 VBR / Loopable / Stereo

Number of Files:

  • 186 (Full Pack)
  • 56 (Essentials)

Total hours of music:

  • 2 hours 5 minutes (Full Pack)
  • 58 minutes (Essentials)

Total project size:

  • Full Pack - WAV: 1.3GB
  • Essentials - WAV: 600MB
  • Full Pack - MP3: 213MB
  • Essentials - MP3: 100MB

See below for full file list.

Licensing Agreement

By purchasing this pack you agree to the following terms:

Your Rights

  • You may use this music pack in any of your projects, whether they're commercial or not.
  • You may edit or remix the sounds in this pack to better suit your project's needs.
  • You may use the music in this pack in multiple projects without further payment.

Restrictions

  • You must credit LudoLoon Studio as the creator of music used from this pack.
  • You may NOT resell, relicense or otherwise distribute this pack or individual tracks by themselves.
  • Copyright ownership of all recordings still belongs to LudoLoon Studio LLC.
  • For any soundtrack deals please contact support@ludoloon.studio to negotiate a deal.
    • Without doing so, you may NOT redistribute tracks from this pack on any platforms as part of a standalone game soundtrack.

Contact

For any help with any issues or inquiries email: support@ludoloon.studio

If you use my track in your project then contact me and I'll share it on my website & social media!

I am available to make custom music for your game at: https://ludoloon.studio/hire

Subscribe to my mailing list for more royalty free tracks sent straight to your inbox.

File List

This pack is divided into 4 different possible downloads (all included with a single purchase):

  • Full Pack - WAV
  • Essentials - WAV
  • Full Pack - MP3
  • Essentials - MP3

Essentials Pack only comes with files under "Full" in each song. Full Pack includes folders labeled "Sections" as well.

File extensions are either WAV or MP3 (as noted by pack).

Unity and Game Dev Market only include the Full Pack - WAV editions because of how their distribution works.

entry.title: Mysterious Fog (Royalty Free Music)
entry.summary: I released my last flight sim portraits track (for now) as a royalty free game asset!
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I've decided to release this track as my last addition to the Flight Sim Portraits project that I had going on. This isn't a definitive end to the project forever, but in light of my goals I've decide that this has served its purpose for now. I do like making these videos, so maybe one day I'll come back to them.

This project has been a great way to get routine practice putting out weekly content, but video production & recording takes up too much time compared to actual music production right now. My next goal is to start making game packs to upload on itch.io and the Unity Asset Store, which is already well under way. Stay tuned!

Asset Stores

Streaming

Available use: Royalty Free Commercial & Non-Commercial.

Track does not include propeller or sound effects heard in video.

Tracks List:

  1. Mysterious Fog - Full Track.wav (3:10)
  2. Mysterious Fog - Intro.wav (0:48)
  3. Mysterious Fog - Loop.wav (1:04)
  4. Mysterious Fog - Outro.wav (0:32)
  5. Mysterious Fog - Pad & Flute Loop.wav (1:04)

Total Length : 6:38s

Please give credit to LudoLoon Studio.
Do not resell or claim my music as your own creation.

If you use my track in your game I'll share it on my website & social media!
E-mail your game promo to: connect@ludoloon.studio

Available to make custom music for your game at: https://ludoloon.studio/hire

Subscribe to my mailing list for more royalty free tracks sent straight to your inbox!

entry.title: Flight Sim Portraits
entry.summary: I started a project to practice making music. What better way than by recording a game I'm already sinking hundreds of hours into!
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I've recently shifted my focus to working on my music more seriously. My goal is to start producing custom music for video games (and beyond), but at the moment I don't have much to show off for LudoLoon Studio since it's a new project. So to build up a little portfolio, and more importantly skill, I've decided to start making music to scenes I record from playing Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020.

For those unaware, Flight Sim 2020 is basically the most photorealistic flight simulator released to date. Literally the whole world is available to explore via satellite imagery, AI generated buildings, trees, etc. If you think it's immersive on a screen, try VR! lol. It's pretty epic to say the least. Most importantly, I already play it a lot.

As you can imagine, it doesn't actually have any music outside of some select discovery flight locations and menus. So it's a pretty good way to explore adding music to suit a visual.

Combine the fact that I like the game, need some practice "vibe matching", and just need to make more music in general to get in the groove of becoming a regular producer again, that's why I'm putting together these videos.

If you like them, please share!

entry.title: LudoLoon Studio Redesign
entry.summary: I've decided to update this site in preparation of focusing on becoming a video game music composer. More to come!
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I've recently decided to pursue my passion for music more seriously instead of game design. I've updated the placeholder website design that was just a landing page into this current one.

That's pretty much it! Keep an eye out for more.
